snippet.title: Chase H.Q. II Longplay (Sega Genesis) [QHD]
snippet.description:
Game Info
---------------------------------------------------
Developer: Taito
Publisher: Sega
Year of Release: 1992

Game Review & Impressions
---------------------------------------------------
Released before the much later Chase HQ 2 retconned this console-only release out of existence, Chase H.Q. II for the Genesis is a fairly humdrum cash-in for the franchise.

In all honesty, apart from the additional vehicles, there's little else of significance here. The appeal of the arcade original was the super-slick scrolling and fast-paced action, which are somewhat lacking here. It's not really bad, just rather dull, which makes it difficult to recommend.

Chapters
---------------------------------------------------
TBC

#chasehq2
#segagenesis
#retrogaming
